title: Charlotte Weather Update: Windy Wednesday, Rainy Thursday
summary: Warmer weather is expected, with rain likely Thursday morning into the afternoon. A significant warm-up is anticipated this weekend.
charlotte_impact: Provides residents with essential weather information to plan their daily activities and prepare for changing conditions.

title: Avelo Airlines Extends Concord Flight Schedule
summary: Avelo Airlines announces extension of its flight schedule from Concord-Padgett Regional Airport through the fall season.
charlotte_impact: Offers continued travel options for residents using the regional airport, boosting local connectivity.

title: CATS Enhances Rider Safety Reporting
summary: Charlotte Area Transit System (CATS) introduces Text-a-Tip and online options for riders to report safety concerns.
charlotte_impact: Improves public transportation safety by providing more accessible reporting channels for riders.

title: Rabid Raccoon Confirmed in Caldwell County
summary: A raccoon found in a horse pasture along Echo Drive tests positive for rabies, posing a public health risk.
charlotte_impact: Raises awareness about rabies and encourages caution around wild animals to prevent potential exposure.

title: NC Senator Urges State Budget Passage After Trump Comments
summary: A North Carolina senator calls for the passage of a state budget, highlighting that NC is the only state without one.
charlotte_impact: Addresses the ongoing budget impasse and its potential impact on state services and funding.

title: Mooresville Woman Wins $1 Million Powerball Prize
summary: Crystal Jones of Mooresville wins a $1 million Powerball prize after matching five white balls in the Feb. 9 drawing.
charlotte_impact: Showcases the possibility of winning lottery prizes and generates local interest in the Powerball game.

title: Waymo Self-Driving Cars Coming to Charlotte
summary: Waymo confirms its self-driving cars are expanding to Charlotte, enabled by a 2017 state law.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the advancement of autonomous vehicle technology and its potential impact on transportation in Charlotte.

title: Charlotte Firefighters Demand Higher Pay, Better Benefits
summary: The Charlotte Firefighters Association (CFFA) advocates for improved compensation to keep pace with job demands and city growth.
charlotte_impact: Addresses concerns about firefighter compensation and its potential impact on public safety and retention.

title: Suspect Arrested in 2024 North Charlotte Homicide
summary: Woodie Rodrick Daniels, III, is arrested in connection to a deadly shooting that occurred in north Charlotte in 2024.
charlotte_impact: Provides updates on ongoing homicide investigations and efforts to bring perpetrators to justice.

title: Trump Recognizes Murder Victim's Mother at State of the Union
summary: Trump mentions Iryna Zarutska's killing and recognizes her mother, Anya Zarutska, during the 2026 State of the Union Address.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the impact of crime on families and the president's focus on cracking down on repeat offenders.

title: Teenager to Remain Jailed in Rock Hill Shooting
summary: A 16-year-old charged in a deadly Rock Hill shooting will remain in jail as the investigation continues.
charlotte_impact: Covers developments in a serious crime involving a minor and the legal proceedings that follow.

title: Science Behind the Massive Northeast Winter Storm

title: Arrest Made After Police Search Hemp Business
summary: An arrest was made after Kings Mountain police searched a hemp business following reports of suspicious activity.

title: Man Accused of Road Rage Assault in Matthews
summary: James Washer, 61, is charged with assault after a road rage incident in Matthews.

title: ICE Arrests Four Men Ahead of Court Hearings

charlotte_impact: Reports on immigration enforcement activities and legal challenges surrounding arrests.
